page.title: 14A Typical Day in our Life 3.
page.content: Then we get our{coats}and{bags}to go home at{3.30.}We put our{chairs}up, and get all the things we need. Then we get line up and the{teacher}comes and takes us round to the{gate.}Then we meet our{mums}and{dads.}When we get home we{play}with our{friends.}We{play {England, Ireland, Scotland,}and{Wales. We go in for{tea.}We have{beefburgers and{beans.}Then we watch{television, {Eastenders}and{Top of the Pops.}At {8.00}we have a{wash}and get ready for {bed.}We wear a{nightie or pyjamas.}We go to{bed}with our{teddies}and have a {drink}and a{biscuit. Mum}comes in to say{goodnight. This account of a typical day was written by a 7 year old schoolgirl.
